solution_line_template: Total stars for the 5-star rating is {num_five_star_reviews} x {five_star_value} = <<{num_five_star_reviews}*{five_star_value}={total_stars_five_star}>>{total_stars_five_star} stars.
Total stars for the 4-star rating is {num_four_star_reviews} x {four_star_value} = <<{num_four_star_reviews}*{four_star_value}={total_stars_four_star}>>{total_stars_four_star} stars.
Total stars for the 3-star rating is {num_three_star_reviews} x {three_star_value} = <<{num_three_star_reviews}*{three_star_value}={total_stars_three_star}>>{total_stars_three_star} stars.
Total stars for the 2-star rating is {num_two_star_reviews} x {two_star_value} = <<{num_two_star_reviews}*{two_star_value}={total_stars_two_star}>>{total_stars_two_star} stars.
